bibl.title: Taposiris Magna, Port of Isis. Hungarian Excavations at Alexandria (1998-2001). English Adaptation: David Robert EVANS.
bibl.note: nombr. figg., cartes, plans, pll. n./bl. et coul.

Introduction. - From antiquity to Napoleon - in the light of historical sources. - 200 years of research (1801-2001). - "Isidi Taposiri". - "The Nile Mosaic" [of Palestrina, until recently considered to be an adaptation of the landscape of ancient Egypt, depicts Taposiris Magna and its surrounding from the vantage point of the top of the Pharos in Alexandria]. - The Taposiris Magna mosaic. - "Osiris has been found!" - Isis has been found! - Taposiris Magna in ancient Egyptian temple architecture. - Future objectives. - Epilogue. - References.
VÖRÖS Gyozo, Taposiris Magna, Port of Isis. Hungarian Excavations at Alexandria (1998-2001). English Adaptation: David Robert EVANS.
Budapest, Egypt Excavation Society of Hungary, 2001, 8°, 205 pp., nombr. figg., cartes, plans, pll. n./bl. et coul. ISBN 963-00-7110-X.
